titleStmt.title: Strange news from Tovver-Ditch being a perfect relation of the vast quantity of fish taken there on Fryday the 20th of this instant October : with the strange manner of their coming in ... as also, the most profitable conjectures of intelligent persons concerning the cause or reason of this wonderful accident.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for P. Brooksby in West-Smith's-field,

notesStmt.note: Date of publication from Wing (2nd ed.).
"This may be printed, October 24. Roger L'Estrange."
Reproduction of original in: British Library.
